product_name: ALPS Mountaineering Endurance Air Sleeping Pad - Regular - Special Buy
long_description: Get a good night's rest while backpacking with the ALPS Mountaineering Endurance Air Sleeping Pad. It features an anti-slip ALPS logo on the top to help keep your sleeping bag from sliding around. Jet Stream foam inside the pad allows for quick self inflation and fast deflation once the brass valves are opened. R-value equals 4.0; most sleeping pads we sell range in R-value from 1.0 (minimally insulated) to 9.5 (well insulated). Top fabric is composed of a double-line ripstop and the bottom is composed of polyester taffeta, making the pad lightweight, yet durable. ALPS Mountaineering Endurance Air Sleeping Pad comes with a stuff sack and repair kit. Special buy.
short_description: Get a good night's rest while backpacking with the ALPS Mountaineering Endurance Air Sleeping Pad. It features an anti-slip ALPS logo on the top to help keep your sleeping bag from sliding around.
